titleStmt.title: Salt upon salt: made out of certain ingenious verses upon the late storm and the death of His Highness ensuing. By which contemplative object, occasion is taken, to offer to consideration the probable neer approaching of greater storms, and more sad consequences. / By Geo. Wither, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

titleStmt.title: Salt upon salt: made out of certain ingenious verses upon the late storm and the death of His Highness ensuing. By which contemplative object, occasion is taken, to offer to consideration the probable neer approaching of greater storms, and more sad consequences. / By Geo. Wither, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for L. Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-Head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug."; the '9' in imprint date is crossed out and replaced with '8'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
